price: «Хурмо танасини силкит, сенга янги мева туширади».
arabic: وَهُزِّيٓ إِلَيۡكِ بِجِذۡعِ ٱلنَّخۡلَةِ تُسَٰقِطۡ عَلَيۡكِ رُطَبٗا جَنِيّٗا

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wahuzzī ilayki bijidh'ʿi al-nakhlati tusāqiṭ ʿalayki ruṭaban janiyyan
